subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Paralysis
X Games
lead_paragraph: BMX champion Tara Llanes had a violent headfirst crash on Sept. 1  that left her paralyzed below the waist, a condition her doctors say is probably permanent.
snippet: BMX champion Tara Llanes had a violent headfirst crash on Sept. 1  that left her paralyzed below the waist, a condition her doctors say is probably permanent.
